title: Joel Osteen Sails Luxury Yacht Through Flooded Houston to Pass out Copies of His Book?
subtitle: A Christian satire site's claim about the popular televangelist using a luxury yacht to promote "Your Best Life Now" in Hurricane Harvey's aftermath was mistaken for real news.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Joel Osteen sailed through flooded Houston distributing copies of his book "Your Best Life Now."
